name: Chess
description: The classic strategy game with gorgeous graphics, online gaming and intuitive interface.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: XP Processor: Intel single core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 2004 GPU Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 Processor: Intel multi core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2010 GPU Storage: 500 MB available space
